jcr:content.jcr:title: BrightEdge Content Optimizer
jcr:content.description: Creating content optimized for search – the largest channel – is challenging. Writers can create great content, but not know how to maximize search discoverability, traffic, and revenue or be able to compare their content to competitors in real-time. BrightEdge Content Optimizer streamlines the process and adds enterprise governance & reporting to empower content creators to quickly optimize their content for search.
